title: CAN RIOT UPDATE VARUS PLZZZZZ
body: Varus need to get some new update cause the other marksman they just smash and deal alot more damage than varus!!!!!!

replies.body: I agree, Varus does need a buff, but a numbers buff. He's a little outclassed to be honest, but he's not weak. All I require is a small numbers tweak. For those wanting Varus to have a gap closer/mobility, he's meant to be an immobile powerhouse of damage, (which he currently is). Give him mobility and he'll be god tier forever.
Varus is actually not bad at the moment. He's also not a terrible mid laner
lol ty guys i found out that ap varus op{{champion:110}}
